meanings.sent1: The gallinippers buzzed loudly around the campsite.
meanings.sent2: I got bitten by a gallinipper while hiking in the woods.
meanings.sent3: The gallinippers seemed to have a preference for biting me!
meanings.sent4: The gallinippers swarmed like tiny helicopters in the evening light.
meanings.sent5: The gallinippers' bites left itchy red bumps on my skin.

meanings.sent1: Please stop gallinippering me with your constant questions.
meanings.sent2: The loud music from the party next door gallinippers me every night.
meanings.sent3: His attempts to gallinipper me into buying more cookies failed.
meanings.sent4: The dripping faucet gallinippers my ears like a persistent drumbeat.
meanings.sent5: The way he chews gum loudly gallinippers everyone in the room.
